title: STOP LYING ABOUT IMMIGRATION, Travolta = Gotti = Academy Award 6.18.18
itunes:title: STOP LYING ABOUT IMMIGRATION, Travolta = Gotti = Academy Award 6.18.18
description:
In episode 171, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Naomi Ekperigin to discuss the recent drama with Tesla and Elon Musk, the outrage over Trump's administration separating immigrant children from their parents, Ted Cruz and Jimmy Kimmel's basketball game, MoviePass's terrible new film 'Gotti,' a World Cupdate, and more! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
